response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and holds significant value to me. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that respects both our interests. I kindly propose a purchase price of $10,000.
